creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: ivory six panel blanket; geometric woven designs in black, ivory rust and gold; tassels at ends of seams joining panels and at ends of edging strips; motifs in horizontal stripes along widths of blanket; elaborate pattern "x" embroidered at one end in brown and black ivory dots and diamonds in rust stripes embroidered (?)
title: Blanket
